1.11.2.1.3.7: Allow customizing the sky render type on non-JED WorldProviders
1.11.2.1.3.6:
Fix unregistering dimensions that weren't actually registered by JED
Refactor/fix some WorldInfo override and related things
1.11.2.1.3.5: Fix forgot to include the spawn fix for WorldProviderEndJED
1.11.2.1.3.4: Fix hostile mobs being unable to spawn in custom dimensions, if the overworld is set to peaceful
1.11.2.1.3.3: Fix the /tpj command being broken when teleporting FROM dimension 1 (vanilla End)
1.11.2.1.3.2:
Changed the /jed command's required permission level from 4 to 2, so that it works in command blocks
Some command and tab completion clean-up
1.11.2.1.3.1:
Accept worldinfo_onetime as well as worldinfo in the config to override the WorldInfo object
Fix the TP command requiring permission level 4 instead of 2
1.11.2.1.3.0:
Several bug fixes and improvements to various things
Added worldinfo_onetime
Added some new commands
1.11.2.1.2.0:
Added the option SkyRenderType to change sky rendering between Overworld or End sky type
Rewrote the teleport command code, again...
1.11.2.1.1.0:
Added day and night cycle length customization
Added sky/cloud/fog color customization and cloud height customization
Added a "ForceGamemode" option for dimensions and a GamemodeTracker to automatically change players' gamemode when they enter/leave dimensions

Some command and tab completion clean-up

Added a "ForceGamemode" option for dimensions and a GamemodeTracker to automatically change players' gamemode when they enter/leave dimensions
1.10.2.1.0.0: Countless fixes, improvements and additions. See the changelog on the CurseForge files page.
1.10.2.1.0.0-beta.1: Major improvements: new commands, re-written teleport command (now supports all entities and entity selectors), per-dimension gamerules/time/weather/WorldBorder/WorldType
